responses.rationale: The segment provides factual production numbers without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment provides factual production and inventory data without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment reports factual culling numbers using the neutral verb 'kill', not a high-potency verb framing the impact alarmingly.
